abstract: General Mills says it will phase out artificial colors and flavors in its cereals, beginning with Trix and Reese's Puffs cereals; number of food companies have made similar moves away from artificial ingredients in response to customer demand.
lead_paragraph: General Mills is dropping artificial colors and flavors from its cereals, the latest company to respond to a growing desire for food made with ingredients people see as natural.

headline.main: No More Artificial Colors for Trix or Reese’s Puffs
headline.print_headline: No More Artificial Colors for Trix or Reese’s Puffs

snippet: General Mills is dropping artificial colors and flavors from its cereals, the latest company to respond to a growing desire for food made with ingredients people see as natural.
